title: Yablee0
author: Yablee0
content: It very sad to know that despite the amazing things bitcoin has done in the crypto space many are still doubting it to be scam. Not knowing it value and potential that can change there life completely.Investing in bitcoin could bring you life time fortunes because it appreciate in value over time, however, delay in bitcoin investment due to reason best known to you is automatically setting you backwards. Message to bitcoin investors : stop the delay, keep buying (investing) bitcoin in large portion as you can, because Bitcoin is nowere close to it's peak.

comments.author: SilverCryptoBullet
comments.body: Quote from: Yablee0 on February 13, 2025, 03:07:22 AMIt very sad to know that despite the amazing things bitcoin has done in the crypto space many are still doubting it to be scam. Not knowing it value and potential that can change there life completely.You can doubt Bitcoin is a scam project in 2009, or some years after that but now in 2025, 16 years since 2009, it's unrealistic and too skeptical to consider it as a scam project while the world are adopting it at wider scale and with very sharp speed.QuoteMessage to bitcoin investors : stop the delay, keep buying (investing) bitcoin in large portion as you can, because Bitcoin is nowere close to it's peak. It's not too early or too late to invest in Bitcoin. People still have a lot of time, but if they can invest now, they have good advantage against later comers who will have to compete each other to buy bitcoin at higher prices.Thinking it is too late to buy bitcoin now only makes you FOMO, that's not good.Plan your personal finance, make your investment strategy like with Dollar Cost Averaging and patiently accumulate bitcoin.https://dcabtc.com/

comments.author: RagnarTheThunderer
comments.body: I understand why some people still doubt bitcoin but skepticism is common with new financial technologies. Over the years, bitcoin has proven its value as a decentralized and scarce asset. While it's true that bitcoin has appreciated significantly, investing should always be a personal decision based on research and risk tolerance. Instead of rushing, it's better to stay informed and make strategic investments. Adoption will grow as more people see its long term benefits.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: And for now, as far as I know, there has been no negative news or anything about Bitcoin and all the news that has happened about Bitcoin is positive and different from Bitcoin at that time. And for those who are still holding back from buying or getting involved with Bitcoin, I think it might be because they don't understand or comprehend Bitcoin well and also its high volatility scares them, and it seems like if they knew how to handle and understand Bitcoin, they would definitely buy it right away, especially if they knew the potential of Bitcoin for the long term. And all of that takes a process because knowledge about Bitcoin can only be obtained with the initiative to find out and also do research that not everyone has that ability, but in the end they will remain involved over time after they know the potential of Bitcoin and also the good news that continues to emerge.

But you should also know that bitcoin is not the only investment or path in the world that helps people change their lives or become rich. Everyone has different preferences, tastes and mindsets so there is nothing wrong and no one is left behind if they choose not to invest in bitcoin and choose a different path. Bitcoin is a financial market, which means there will be winners and losers, and it all depends on each person's ability, knowledge and experience. comments.author: BlockExplorer24
comments.body: Quote from: Yablee0 on February 13, 2025, 03:07:22 AMIt very sad to know that despite the amazing things bitcoin has done in the crypto space many are still doubting it to be scam. Not knowing it value and potential that can change there life completely.Investing in bitcoin could bring you life time fortunes because it appreciate in value over time, however, delay in bitcoin investment due to reason best known to you is automatically setting you backwards. Message to bitcoin investors : stop the delay, keep buying (investing) bitcoin in large portion as you can, because Bitcoin is nowere close to it's peak. Investing in Bitcoin? Yes, but not blindly! This kind of message triggers **FOMO (Fear of Missing Out)**, which can be risky. Bitcoin is a volatile asset, and while its adoption and value have skyrocketed, a **DCA (Dollar-Cost Averaging)** strategy is much wiser than blindly **"buying large portions."**  The key is **strategy**: understanding market cycles, managing risk, and never investing more than you can afford to lose. **Bitcoin has huge potential, but smart investing always beats reckless enthusiasm!** 🚀

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Well, although I share the OP's message in spirit first I have to say that saying it here right in this forum is not going to make much of an impact. Those of us who have been investing in bitcoin for a long time are not going to be influenced and forum members who don't buy because they are in a tight financial situation or are degenerate gamblers, things like that, are not going to be influenced either. But there are a lot of people out there who are investing for example in bonds or bad stock funds who could gain a lot by investing even a part in bitcoin.
